sentences.en: ...a prospectus for a new issue of stock.
An order form was included with the prospectus.
Do your own research and read the prospectus . Study.
sentences.cn: 你要自己做研究,而且要阅读招募说明书.

sentences.en: I'm sure you've got a whole prospectus on the subject, right?
sentences.cn: 我相信关于这个主题你有一整本说明书, 对 吗 ?

sentences.en: In its prospectus , Blackstone warns it will stick to a long - term focus.
sentences.cn: 黑石在他的预期中指出黑石将注重 长期 发展.

sentences.en: Investors please refer to prospectus for further details of the unit trust.
sentences.cn: 有意作出投资的人士应参阅有关基金的要约文件.

sentences.en: Option: Please send me option agreement & prospectus.
sentences.cn: 期权: 请邮寄期权和约 及 公开说明书给我.

sentences.en: Please refer to the Term Prospectus for tuition fees of individual courses.
sentences.cn: 个别学科之学费,请参阅当季章程.

sentences.en: Please send prospectus and enrollment form, and details of fees for a short English course.
sentences.cn: 请寄贵校简章及报名单, 以及短期英语课程的收费细节.

sentences.en: Prospectus, if the company is established through subscription.
sentences.cn: 以募集方式设立公司的, 还须提交招股说明书.

sentences.en: The restaurant have girls hand out prospectus in the street.
sentences.cn: 饭店请姑娘们在街上散发宣传小册子.

sentences.en: The Tories will have to supply a more comprehensive prospectus than they have so far.
sentences.cn: 它实际上标志着一场遥遥无期的政治大选拉开了序幕.

sentences.en: This Association reserves the right for any amendments in this prospectus.
sentences.cn: 本章程如有未尽善处,本会有权随时修改.

sentences.en: This Department reserves the right for any amendments in this prospectus.
sentences.cn: 本章程如有未尽善处,本署有权随时修改.

sentences.en: Yes, as long as the prospectus correctly reflects the dangers.
sentences.cn: 应该, 只要招股说明书正确反映了其中的危险.

sentences.en: Yes, I did read about it in the prospectus you sent me about the section.
sentences.cn: 对了, 在你们寄给我的质检科规划书中我读到过.

words.tran_cn: 内容说明书；样张；创办计划书

trans.tran_cn: 内容说明书，（即将出版的书等的）内容介绍，简介，计划书，意见书，（讲义等的）大纲
trans.tran_en: A prospectus is a detailed document produced by a company, college, or school, which gives details about it
